sqlMap.insert: insert into YWXT_YWXTXXB_STORE (id, ywnr, ywlx, datajson, bz, xt_cjsj, xt_lrsj, xt_lrrxm, xt_lrrid, xt_lrrbm, xt_lrrbmid, xt_lrip, xt_zhxgsj, xt_zhxgrxm, xt_zhxgrid, xt_zhxgrbm, xt_zhxgrbmid, xt_zhxgip, xt_zxbz, xt_zxyy) SELECT id, ywnr, ywlx, datajson, bz, xt_cjsj, xt_lrsj, xt_lrrxm, xt_lrrid, xt_lrrbm, xt_lrrbmid, xt_lrip, xt_zhxgsj, xt_zhxgrxm, xt_zhxgrid, xt_zhxgrbm, xt_zhxgrbmid, xt_zhxgip, xt_zxbz, xt_zxyy FROM YWXT_YWXTXXB WHERE ID = #id#

insert into YWXT_CYRYXXB_STORE (id, cyrid, cyrxm, xtdz, xtjg, xtywid, bz, xt_cjsj, xt_lrsj, xt_lrrxm, xt_lrrid, xt_lrrbm, xt_lrrbmid, xt_lrip, xt_zhxgsj, xt_zhxgrxm, xt_zhxgrid, xt_zhxgrbm, xt_zhxgrbmid, xt_zhxgip, xt_zxbz, xt_zxyy, sszrq, sspcs) SELECT id, cyrid, cyrxm, xtdz, xtjg, xtywid, bz, xt_cjsj, xt_lrsj, xt_lrrxm, xt_lrrid, xt_lrrbm, xt_lrrbmid, xt_lrip, xt_zhxgsj, xt_zhxgrxm, xt_zhxgrid, xt_zhxgrbm, xt_zhxgrbmid, xt_zhxgip, xt_zxbz, xt_zxyy, sszrq, sspcs FROM YWXT_CYRYXXB WHERE ID = #id#
